tags.name: api-endpoint-documentation
tags.description:
`api-endpoint-documentation`

A component to generate documentation for an endpoint from the AMF model.

attributes.name: selected
attributes.description:
The ID in `amf` of current selection. It can be this endpoint
or any of methods

attributes.name: baseUri
attributes.description:
A property to set to override AMF's model base URI information.
When this property is set, the `endpointUri` property is recalculated.

attributes.name: apiVersion
attributes.description: Computed value, API version name

attributes.name: endpointUri
attributes.description:
Endpoint URI to display in main URL field.
This value is computed when `amf`, `endpoint` or `baseUri` change.

attributes.name: endpointName
attributes.description:
Endpoint name.
It should be either a "displayName" or endpoint's relative
path.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Computed value of method description from `method` property.

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: Computed value of endpoint's path.

attributes.name: hasCustomProperties
attributes.description:
Computed value from current `method`. True if the model containsPATCH
custom properties (annotations in RAML).

attributes.name: narrow
attributes.description: If set it will renders the view in the narrow layout.

attributes.name: parentTypeName
attributes.description: Computed value for parent type name.

attributes.name: noTryIt
attributes.description:
Passing value of `noTryIt` to the method documentation.
Hides the "Try it" button from the view.

attributes.name: hasOperations
attributes.description: Computed value if the endpoint contains operations.

attributes.name: inlineMethods
attributes.description:
If set then it renders methods documentation inline with
the endpoint documentation.
When it's not set (or value is `false`, default) then it renders
just a list of methods with links.

attributes.name: noUrlEditor
attributes.description:
In inline mode, passes the `noUrlEditor` value on the
`api-request-panel`

attributes.name: redirectUri
attributes.description:
OAuth2 redirect URI.
This value **must** be set in order for OAuth 1/2 to work properly.
This is only required in inline mode (`inlineMethods`).

attributes.name: compatibility
attributes.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint components.

attributes.name: outlined
attributes.description: Applied outlined theme to the try it panel

attributes.name: graph
attributes.description: Passed to `api-type-document`. Enables internal links rendering for types.

attributes.name: noNavigation
attributes.description: When set it hides bottom navigation links

attributes.name: serverValue
attributes.description:
Holds the value of the currently selected server
Data type: URI

attributes.name: serverType
attributes.description:
Holds the type of the currently selected server
Values: `server` | `uri` | `custom`

attributes.name: noServerSelector
attributes.description:
Optional property to set
If true, the server selector is not rendered

attributes.name: allowCustomBaseUri
attributes.description:
Optional property to set
If true, the server selector custom base URI option is rendered

properties.name: endpoint
properties.description:
Method's endpoint definition as a
`http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#endpoint` of AMF model.

properties.name: selected
properties.description:
The ID in `amf` of current selection. It can be this endpoint
or any of methods

properties.name: baseUri
properties.description:
A property to set to override AMF's model base URI information.
When this property is set, the `endpointUri` property is recalculated.

properties.name: apiVersion
properties.description: Computed value, API version name

properties.name: endpointUri
properties.description:
Endpoint URI to display in main URL field.
This value is computed when `amf`, `endpoint` or `baseUri` change.

properties.name: server
properties.description:
Computed value of the `http://raml.org/vocabularies/http#server`
from `amf`

properties.name: endpointName
properties.description:
Endpoint name.
It should be either a "displayName" or endpoint's relative
path.

properties.name: description
properties.description: Computed value of method description from `method` property.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Computed value of endpoint's path.

properties.name: hasCustomProperties
properties.description:
Computed value from current `method`. True if the model containsPATCH
custom properties (annotations in RAML).

properties.name: narrow
properties.description: If set it will renders the view in the narrow layout.

properties.name: extendsTypes
properties.description: List of traits and resource types, if any.

properties.name: parentType
properties.description:
Computed value of a parent type.
In RAML it is resource type that can be applied to a resource.

properties.name: parentTypeName
properties.description: Computed value for parent type name.

properties.name: traits
properties.description: List of traits applied to this endpoint

properties.name: previous
properties.description:
Model to generate a link to previous HTTP endpoint.
It should contain `id` and `label` properties

properties.name: next
properties.description:
Model to generate a link to next HTTP endpoint.
It should contain `id` and `label` properties

properties.name: scrollTarget
properties.description:
Scroll target used to observe `scroll` event.
When set the element will observe scroll and inform other components
about changes in navigation while scrolling through methods list.
The navigation event contains `passive: true` property that
determines that it's not user triggered navigation but rather
context enforced.

properties.name: noTryIt
properties.description:
Passing value of `noTryIt` to the method documentation.
Hides the "Try it" button from the view.

properties.name: operations
properties.description: Computed list of operations to render in the operations list.

properties.name: hasOperations
properties.description: Computed value if the endpoint contains operations.

properties.name: inlineMethods
properties.description:
If set then it renders methods documentation inline with
the endpoint documentation.
When it's not set (or value is `false`, default) then it renders
just a list of methods with links.

properties.name: noUrlEditor
properties.description:
In inline mode, passes the `noUrlEditor` value on the
`api-request-panel`

properties.name: redirectUri
properties.description:
OAuth2 redirect URI.
This value **must** be set in order for OAuth 1/2 to work properly.
This is only required in inline mode (`inlineMethods`).

properties.name: compatibility
properties.description: Enables compatibility with Anypoint components.

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Applied outlined theme to the try it panel

properties.name: graph
properties.description: Passed to `api-type-document`. Enables internal links rendering for types.

properties.name: noNavigation
properties.description: When set it hides bottom navigation links

properties.name: serverValue
properties.description:
Holds the value of the currently selected server
Data type: URI

properties.name: serverType
properties.description:
Holds the type of the currently selected server
Values: `server` | `uri` | `custom`

properties.name: noServerSelector
properties.description:
Optional property to set
If true, the server selector is not rendered

properties.name: allowCustomBaseUri
properties.description:
Optional property to set
If true, the server selector custom base URI option is rendered

properties.name: ns
properties.description: A namespace for AMF model.

properties.name: amf
properties.description:
Generated AMF json/ld model form the API spec.
The element assumes the object of the first array item to be a
type of `"http://raml.org/vocabularies/document#Document`
on AMF vocabulary.

It is only usefult for the element to resolve references.
